query:
ALTER TABLE attractions
ADD COLUMN openingHours JSON COMMENT '開放時間，格式：{"monday": {"open": "09:00", "close": "17:00"}, ...}',
ADD COLUMN closedDays JSON COMMENT '休館日，格式：["2024-01-01", "2024-12-25"]',
ADD COLUMN requiresBooking BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL COMMENT '是否需要預約',
ADD COLUMN contactPerson VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '對接人姓名',
ADD COLUMN contactPhone VARCHAR(50) COMMENT '對接人電話';
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 41NsuGXnm89dPgc.aed783a1450b --database P3EFPXo6PDntRisxqhyY6k --execute ALTER TABLE attractions
ADD COLUMN openingHours JSON COMMENT '開放時間，格式：{"monday": {"open": "09:00", "close": "17:00"}, ...}',
ADD COLUMN closedDays JSON COMMENT '休館日，格式：["2024-01-01", "2024-12-25"]',
ADD COLUMN requiresBooking BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL COMMENT '是否需要預約',
ADD COLUMN contactPerson VARCHAR(100) COMMENT '對接人姓名',
ADD COLUMN contactPhone VARCHAR(50) COMMENT '對接人電話';
